titleInfo.title: Demonstrating the Dialogue System of the Intelligent Coaching Space
Proceedings of the 19th Workshop on the Semantics and Pragmatics of Dialogue

bibliographicCitation.bio1:

Demonstrating the Dialogue System of the Intelligent Coaching Space.
